name: WindowEventHandlers
description: WindowEventHandlers mixin describes the event handlers common to several interfaces like Window, or HTMLBodyElement andÂ  HTMLFrameSetElement. Each of these interfaces can implement additional specific event handlers.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onafterprint
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the afterprint event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onbeforeprint
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the beforeprint event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onbeforeunload
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the beforeunload event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onhashchange
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the hashchange event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onlanguagechange
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the languagechange event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onmessage
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the message event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onoffline
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the offline event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.ononline
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the online event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onpagehide
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pagehide event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onpageshow
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the pageshow event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onpopstate
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the popstate event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onstorage
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the storage event is raised.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onunhandledrejection
members.description: An event handler for unhandled Promise rejection events.

members.name: WindowEventHandlers.onunload
members.description: Is an EventHandler representing the code to be called when the unload event is raised.
